Aromatic.name: Basil
Aromatic.description: Sweet and pungent aroma, perfect for home decor.

Aromatic.name: Borage
Aromatic.description: Cucumber like scent, ideal for gardens and pots.

Aromatic.name: Lilacs
Aromatic.description: Beautiful purple flowers with a sweet fragrance.

Aromatic.name: Melissa
Aromatic.description: Lemon-scented leaves, great for teas and potpourri.

Aromatic.name: Rosemary
Aromatic.description: Aromatic evergreen herb with needle-like leaves.

Aromatic.name: Sage
Aromatic.description: Aromatic herb with gray-green leaves, used in cooking and for its fragrance.

Flowering.name: Roses
Flowering.description: Classic flowers with a wide range of colors and fragrances.

Flowering.name: Tulips
Flowering.description: Elegant flowers that bloom in spring, available in many colors.

Flowering.name: Daisies
Flowering.description: Simple yet beautiful flowers with white petals and yellow centers.

Flowering.name: Sunflowers
Flowering.description: Tall flowers with large yellow petals and a dark center, known for their bright appearance.

Flowering.name: Lilies
Flowering.description: Elegant flowers with trumpet-shaped blooms, available in various colors.

Flowering.name: Orchids
Flowering.description: Exotic flowers with unique shapes and vibrant colors, often used in arrangements.

Medicinal.name: Aloe Vera
Medicinal.description: Known for its soothing gel, used for skin care and burns.

Medicinal.name: Chamomile
Medicinal.description: Used for its calming properties, often brewed as tea.

Medicinal.name: Jatropha
Medicinal.description: Known for its medicinal properties, used in traditional medicine.

Medicinal.name: Lavender
Medicinal.description: Known for its calming scent, used in aromatherapy and skin care.

Medicinal.name: moroccan mint
Medicinal.description: A fragrant herb used in teas and for its digestive benefits.

Medicinal.name: Oregano
Medicinal.description: A culinary herb with medicinal properties, used in cooking and for its health benefits.

Purifier.name: Alocasia Botany
Purifier.description: A striking plant with large, arrow-shaped leaves that purifies the air.

Purifier.name: Ceratophyllum
Purifier.description: Aquatic plant that thrives in water and helps filter pollutants.

Purifier.name: Snake Plant
Purifier.description: Hardy plant that thrives in low light and improves indoor air quality.

Purifier.name: Ferns
Purifier.description: Known for their lush foliage, ferns help to humidify and purify the air.

Purifier.name: Green Lustrous
Purifier.description: A vibrant plant with glossy leaves that adds a touch of greenery to any space.

Purifier.name: Peace Lily
Purifier.description: Peace Lily, known for its elegant white flowers and air-purifying qualities.
